item.title: Version 1.0.12+13
item.description:
Release notes - 1.0.12+13

Features:

  • Added floating button at the statistics screen to export data table as a CSV file, while preserving format, amount of rows and columns and sorting order.
  • Added possibility to pause tracking activity for a set period of time.

Fixes:

  • Fixed issue with "Work time" and "Desk time" not calculating correctly.
  • Fixed issue with statistics showing incorrect or no data at all.
  • Fixed multiple issues with applications not having correct names or not showing even with activity being present.
  • Fixed issue with productive time showing over 100% productivity.

item.title: Version 1.0.15+16
item.description:
Release notes - 1.0.15+16

Features:

  • Added possibility to download screenshots in bulk.
  • Added zoom in/out on tap in screenshots playback.
  • Updated tray menu to include starting/stopping/pausing activity.
  • Now silent uninstall deletes user data.
  • Added button in settings to export logs.
  • Now Windows installer checks, if additional libraries are already installed.

Fixes:

  • Fixed departments not honoring user rights when filtering.
  • Fixed CTD on Windows when no shared preferences were set.
  • Fixed the issue with today screenshots not being updated correctly.
  • Fixed applications names not being displayed correctly or not being tracked at all.
  • Fixed the issue of QTime occasionally crashing and stopping tracking.
